name: reldmmap

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cmap, universe, universe, cab(hs2, wf(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
stmt.pretty: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cmap, universe, universe, { hs2 |(hs2 : hs1 → hs0)})

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cmap))
-| wceq(cmap, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cab(hs2, wf(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(↦))
⊣ ↦ =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { hs2 |(hs2 : hs1 → hs0)})
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cmap))
-| wceq(cmap, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cab(hs2, wf(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(↦))
⊣ ↦ =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { hs2 |(hs2 : hs1 → hs0)})
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cmap, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cab(hs2, wf(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
body.pretty:
⊢ ↦ =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { hs2 |(hs2 : hs1 → hs0)})
⊣ d(hs0, hs2)
⊣ d(hs1, hs2)
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cmap))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(↦))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)
⊣ d(hs0, hs2)
⊣ d(hs1, hs2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cmap))
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(↦))
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)
⊣ d(hs0, hs2)
⊣ d(hs1, hs2)

comment: Set exponentiation is a well-behaved binary operator. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.)
